pkgmetadata.longdescription: Find Pattern in Files // Creates a HTML widget which displays the results of searching for a pattern in files in a given folder. The results can be viewed in the 'RStudio' viewer pane, included in a 'R Markdown' document or in a 'Shiny' application. Also provides a 'Shiny' application allowing to run this widget and to navigate in the files found by the search. Instead of creating a HTML widget, it is also possible to get the results of the search in a 'tibble'. The search is performed by the 'grep' command-line utility.
